body: Do sponges no longer work? liek a month ago they still worked... but now they don't for me... I'm using 1.7.10... whats the problem? :c i checked on google, but there werent any updates in a month's period related to getting rid of the sponge's purpose....
body_tagged: Do sponges no longer work? liek a month ago they still worked... but now they don't for me... I'm using 1.7.10... whats the problem? :c i checked on google, but there werent any updates in a month's period related to getting rid of the sponge's purpose....
title: Sponges?

replies.body:
Sponge's have no purpose on any version before 1.8.

On 1.8 they soak water

What do you refer on how they work?
replies.body_tagged:
Sponge's have no purpose on any version before 1.8.

On 1.8 they soak water

replies.body:
I think 1.7.10 is getting ready for 1.8 and they removed the Old sponge mechanics :P

@Cobalt838.. They did server a purpose of removing water as well only without getting wet and not being able to keep that up :P

replies.body:
Yes you have to wait for V1.8 :(

Its a shame that the sponges have been changed because they led to awesome BUD mechanics giving an update to a 5x5 area around it. I'm not sure if the new sponges do that though.
